  similar idea to dead short across input.  connect transistor backwards-good amp/osc.
   
   
  resonant tunneling of a slightly different kind. 
   
   
   the particle that tunnels seems to be -not an electron, not a majority carrier, but a positive particle one tenth the mass of electron ---a FAST HOLE?  (google: "fast hole")
